content: What we did give and what we think is relevant is our installed base, which we talked about growing 54% to 4,000 consoles in 2023 and we talked about our expected revenue growth of 22% to 30% for the full year and thatâs sort of given shape in terms of the fact that we expect homes to grow faster than acute, and so we think that those are the right metrics to monitor as we are looking forward.
